name: Convert to Markdown
description: Convert your transcribed text to well-formatted Markdown syntax using OpenAI.
instructions:
Get your OpenAI API key: https://platform.openai.com/api-keys

The prompt should include {text}, which will be replaced with your transcribed text after removing the trigger phrase.
